label_time_to_contribute: I ti sada pruži svoj doprinos!
label_allow_access_to_camera: World Cleanup would like to Access the camera.
label_allow_access_to_location: World Cleanup would like to Access your location.
label_add_more_trashpoints: Add more trashpoints to the app.
label_button_tc_agree: Slažem se s uvjetima i odredbama
label_text_popover_subtitle: Pridružite se ostalim ljudima koji kartiraju otpad!
label_text_popover_text: Start creating trashpoints to make your community cleaner and healthier.
label_text_activity_empty_text: You haven't added any trashpoints yet. When you do, they will be listed here.
label_text_notific_empty_text: Nismo još dobili nove obavijesti, ali javit ćemo ti čim stignu!
label_text_congrats_text: Now save the point by verifying the data.
label_text_logout: Are you sure that you want to leave the app?
label_leave_text: Do you want to leave this screen?
label_event_created_text: Thank you! Your event was created. Let's clean our planet together!
label_text_createTP_status_text: Ako je potrebna hitna intervencija (otrovne tvari, teški metali), označi kao prijetnju
label_text_editTP_ask: Is this trashpoint information still correct and up to date?
label_error_editTP_out_of_rng_text: A point can only be edited if you are within 100 meters of it.
label_error_saveTP_pic_and_type: It's more useful for us if you take at least one picture of the trashpoint and set its trash type.
label_error_saveTP_picture: It's more useful for us if you take at least one picture of the trashpoint before saving.
label_error_saveTP_trash_type: It's more useful for us if you set the trashpoint's type before saving.
label_error_change_loc_text: Please place a point within 100 meters of your location.
label_error_generic_error_text: There was an error on the server.
label_error_network_text: Mobile data is disabled. Enable mobile data or connect your phone to Wi-Fi to use the application.
label_error_location_text: Location Services are turned off. Please enable your GPS in your Settings to use the application.
label_error_loc_permission_text: Location Services are not permitted. Please allow them in order to use the application.
label_100m_limit_modal: A point can only be edited if you are within 100 meters of it.
label_camera_permission_warning_ios: You must change camera access permissions. To do this, go to Settings > Privacy > Camera
label_camera_permission_warning_android: You must change camera access permissions. To do this, go to Settings > Apps
label_error_modal_default_subtitle: The fail whale detected a server error!
label_location_permission_warning_ios: You must change location permissions. To do this, go to Settings > Privacy > Location services.
label_location_permission_warning_androi: You must change location permissions. To do this, go to Settings > Apps.
label_location_off_warning: Location Services are turned off. Please enable your GPS in your Settings to use the application.
label_network_off_warning: Mobile data is disabled. Enable mobile data or connect your phone to Wi-Fi to use the application.
label_loading_image_subtext: Molimo pričekajte dok spremimo Vaše radnje.
label_create_marker_missing_photos: The marker photos could not be uploaded. Please try adding them again.
label_edit_marker_missing_photos: The marker photos could not be uploaded. Please try adding them again.
label_confirm_marker_missing_photos: The marker photos could not be uploaded. Please try adding them again.
label_delete_modal_text: Do you want to delete event?
label_delete_photo_subtitle: Jesi li siguran/na da želiš izbrisati fotografiju? Ne možeš ovo poništiti.
label_text_about_1: Ova aplikacija je inicijativa pokreta Let's Do It World
label_text_about_2: All the data collected by users worldwide will be visualised in the global trash map for initiating worldwide clean-up events on World Cleanup Day, 15 September 2018
label_text_about_3: This app is a joint cooperation with
label_text_about_4: Estonian product, sponsored by the country and government
label_text_about_5: Funders: Estonian Ministry of Environment, The Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Estonia, Estonian Republic 100 program
label_locked_account_warning: Tvoj račun je zaključan. Za detalje se obrati administratoru.
label_invite_offline_attendees: If you plan to bring people with you, add the number
label_tip_add_trashpoints: Set location in order to add trashpoints
label_invalid_event_field: Title is required and should be less than 70 characters.
label_invalid_coordinator_field: Coordinator name should be less than 70 characters.
label_invalid_event_description: is required and should be less than 500 characters.
label_private_profile_wor:
Your profile should be public
in order to post event.
label_private_auth_wor:
You need to be a registered user
in order to create events.
label_private_auth_trashpoint_wor:
You need to be a registered user
in order to create trashpoint.
label_title_trashpoint_created: Add more trashpoints to the app!
label_every_small_step:
Every small step matters. Let’s
clean our planet together.
label_no_place_left_text: Please contact the creator of event in order to join.
label_tag_household_description: Waste from homes, such as food scraps, packaging from food and cleaning products, clothes.
label_tag_non_household_description: Waste coming from shops, factories, often big amount of the same thing (a pile of the same shoe types, large amount of bananas)
label_tag_construction_description: Items and materials used in building (bricks, windows, cement, rocks)
label_privacy_warning: In private profile all of your trashpoints become anonymous
label_privacy_text: By making your profile public your name will be attached to all your existing and new trashpoints
label_you_are_profile_creator: You are an event creator! You can’t make your profile private
label_you_have_events: while you have events connected to your profile.
menu_sub_title: Let's create a cleaner world together. Join me! #WorldCleanupDay
